sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE165010 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , CNBT_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CD , CONB_CHG_CD , YRS_MATE_CL_CD , DNTCNTN , COPL_NM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , CNBT_RLT_CL_CD , CNBT_RLT_CHG_CD , CNBT_FNM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DNT_SCNT , USE_SUM_AMT , DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT , CONB_SUM_AMT , CNBT_ETC , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , ( SELECT NVL( MAX(CNBT_SEIL_NUM)+1 ,1) FROM YE165010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# ) , #conbCd# , ( SELECT MANGE_ITEM01 FROM BASS0300 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND COMM_CD = #conbCd# AND RPSTTV_CD = 'B023' AND MANGE_ITEM02 = 'Y' ) , #yrsMateClCd# , #dntcntn# , #coplNm# , #bsnoEncCntn# , #cnbtRltClCd# , ( SELECT MANGE_ITEM11 FROM BASS0300 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND COMM_CD = #cnbtRltClCd# AND RPSTTV_CD = 'Y018' ) , #cnbtFnm# , #resnoEncCntn# , #dntScnt# , #useSumAmt# , #ddcTrgtConbAmt# , #conbSumAmt# , #cnbtEtc# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE YE165010 SET CONB_CD = #conbCd# , CONB_CHG_CD = ( SELECT BA0300.MANGE_ITEM01 FROM BASS0300 BA0300 WHERE BA0300.DPOB_CD = DPOB_CD AND BA0300.COMM_CD = CONB_CD AND BA0300.RPSTTV_CD = 'B023' AND BA0300.MANGE_ITEM02 = 'Y' ) , YRS_MATE_CL_CD = #yrsMateClCd# , DNTCNTN = #dntcntn# , COPL_NM = #coplNm# , BSNO_ENC_CNTN = #bsnoEncCntn# , CNBT_RLT_CL_CD = #cnbtRltClCd# , CNBT_RLT_CHG_CD = ( SELECT BA0300.MANGE_ITEM11 FROM BASS0300 BA0300 WHERE BA0300.DPOB_CD = DPOB_CD AND BA0300.COMM_CD = CNBT_RLT_CL_CD AND BA0300.RPSTTV_CD = 'Y018' ) , CNBT_FNM = #cnbtFnm# , RESNO_ENC_CNTN = #resnoEncCntn# , DNT_SCNT = #dntScnt# , USE_SUM_AMT = #useSumAmt#
, CONB_SUM_AMT = #conbSumAmt# , CNBT_ETC = #cnbtEtc# , ISMT = #ismt# , REVN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr# , DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT = #ddcTrgtConbAmt#
WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND CNBT_SEIL_NUM = #cnbtSeilNum#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , CNBT_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CD , CONB_CD AS conbCdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, CONB_CD) AS conbCdcommCdNm , CONB_CHG_CD , YRS_MATE_CL_CD , YRS_MATE_CL_CD AS yrsMateClCdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, YRS_MATE_CL_CD) AS yrsMateClCdcommCdNm , DNTCNTN , COPL_NM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , CNBT_RLT_CL_CD , CNBT_RLT_CL_CD AS cnbtRltClCdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, CNBT_RLT_CL_CD) AS cnbtRltClCdcommCdNm , CNBT_RLT_CHG_CD , CNBT_FNM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DNT_SCNT , USE_SUM_AMT , DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT , CONB_SUM_AMT , CNBT_ETC , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR
FROM YE165010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , COPL_NM , DNT_SCNT
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(SYSTEMKEY) totcnt FROM YE165010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE165010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE165010 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CNBT_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CD , CONB_NM , YRS_MATE_CL_CD , DNTCNTN , COPL_NM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , CNBT_RLT_CL_CD , CNBT_FNM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DNT_SCNT , USE_SUM_AMT , DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT , CONB_SUM_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #cnbtSeilNum# , #conbCd# , #conbNm# , #yrsMateClCd# , #dntcntn# , #coplNm# , #bsnoEncCntn# , #cnbtRltClCd# , #cnbtFnm# , #resnoEncCntn# , #dntScnt# , #useSumAmt# , #ddcTrgtConbAmt# , #conbSumAmt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE165010 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , CNBT_SEIL_NUM=#cnbtSeilNum# , CONB_CD=#conbCd# , CONB_NM=#conbNm# , YRS_MATE_CL_CD=#yrsMateClCd# , DNTCNTN=#dntcntn# , COPL_NM=#coplNm# , BSNO_ENC_CNTN=#bsnoEncCntn# , CNBT_RLT_CL_CD=#cnbtRltClCd# , CNBT_FNM=#cnbtFnm# , RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#resnoEncCntn# , DNT_SCNT=#dntScnt# , USE_SUM_AMT=#useSumAmt# , DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT=#ddcTrgtConbAmt# , CONB_SUM_AMT=#conbSumAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CNBT_SEIL_NUM=#cnbtSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE165010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CNBT_SEIL_NUM=#cnbtSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CNBT_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CD , CONB_NM , YRS_MATE_CL_CD , DNTCNTN , COPL_NM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , CNBT_RLT_CL_CD , CNBT_FNM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DNT_SCNT , USE_SUM_AMT , DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT , CONB_SUM_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE165010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CNBT_SEIL_NUM=#cnbtSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CNBT_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CD , CONB_NM , YRS_MATE_CL_CD , DNTCNTN , COPL_NM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , CNBT_RLT_CL_CD , CNBT_FNM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DNT_SCNT , USE_SUM_AMT , DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT , CONB_SUM_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE165010 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , CNBT_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE165010 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
